price: "Allah zai gãfarta muku daga zunubanku kuma Ya jinkirta muku zuwa ga ajalin da aka ambata. Lalle ne ajalin Allah idan ya zo, ba za a jinkirta Shi ba, dã kun kasance masana (ga abin da nake faɗã dã, kun bar kãfirci)."
arabic: يَغۡفِرۡ لَكُم مِّن ذُنُوبِكُمۡ وَيُؤَخِّرۡكُمۡ إِلَىٰٓ أَجَلٖ مُّسَمًّىۚ إِنَّ أَجَلَ ٱللَّهِ إِذَا جَآءَ لَا يُؤَخَّرُۚ لَوۡ كُنتُمۡ تَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
